item.title: ID-8 West - Moscow
item.description: ID-8 west along the Pullman Highway in Moscow.

item.title: ID-8 East at ID-9
item.description: ID-8 east at ID-9 north to Potlatch. Continue on ID-8 east for Deary and Bovill.

item.title: ID-8 East Approaching ID-9
item.description: ID-8 east approaching ID-9

item.title: ID-8 East Approaching ID-9
item.description: ID-8 east approaching ID-9

item.title: ID-8 East at ID-99
item.description: ID-8 east at ID-99 south to Kendrick. Continue on ID-8 for Deary and Bovill.

item.title: US-95 North At ID-8 East
item.description: US-95 north at ID-8 east. ID-8 west joins US-95 into downtown Moscow.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-8
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-8. Use ID-8 east for Troy. Use US-95 north/ID-8 west for Potlatch and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-8 West
item.description: US-95 north at ID-8 west to Pullman (Washington). US-95 continues north to Potlatch and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-8 East at US-95
item.description: ID-8 east at US-95. ID-8 joins US-95 south through Moscow.

item.title: ID-8 East at US-95
item.description: ID-8 east at US-95. Follow US-95 South/ID-8 East for Troy and Lewiston. Use US-95 North for Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-8 East Approaching US-95
item.description: ID-8 east approaching US-95.

item.title: Jct. US-95 on ID-8 East
item.description: Jct. US-95 on ID-8 East

item.title: ID-8 East at Perimeter Drive
item.description: ID-8 east at Perimeter Drive. Use Perimeter Drive south for the Kibbie Dome at the University of Idaho.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-8 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-8 east. Entering Moscow. Moscow is home to the University of Idaho.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-3. ID-8 west joins ID-3 south to Deary. Use ID-8/ID-3 for Deary and Moscow. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries.

item.title: ID-8 West At ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-3.

item.title: US-95 South/ID-8 At ID-8 East
item.description: US-95 South/ID-8 East at ID-8 East junction in Moscow.

item.title: US-95 South/ID-8 Approaching ID-8 East
item.description: US-95 South/ID-8 East approaching US-95/ID-8 split. Use ID-8 east for Troy; turn right for US-95 south to Lewiston and Boise.

item.title: US-95 South/ID-8 Approaching ID-8 East
item.description: US-95 South/ID-8 East approaching US-95/ID-8 split in Moscow. Use left lane for ID-8 east.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-8
item.description: US-95 south at ID-8. Turn right for ID-8 west to Pullman (WA). Go straight for US-95 South/ID-8 for Lewiston and Troy (via ID-8). ID-8 joins US-95 through downtown Moscow.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-8
item.description: US-95 South approaching ID-8 in Moscow.

item.title: End ID-9 at ID-8
item.description: End ID-9 at ID-8 east to Deary and Bovill, and west to Troy.

item.title: End ID-9 South at ID-8
item.description: End ID-9 south at ID-8.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-8
item.description: ID-3 south at ID-8.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-8
item.description: ID-3 south approaching ID-8. ID-3 follows ID-8 south to Deary.

item.title: ID-8 East at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 east to Bovill and St. Maries, at ID-3 south to Kendrick.

item.title: ID-8 East at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 east at ID-3 south. ID-3 follows ID-8 north to Bovill.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-3 South
item.description: ID-8 west/ID-3 south at ID-3 south.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-9
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-9 north.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-9
item.description: ID-8 west to Troy and Moscow, at ID-9 north to Potlatch.
